title: iOS 15 and iPadOS 15 preview: the good, the bad, and the weird
description: iOS 15 and iPadOS 15 are Apples latest and greatest operating systems, and the public beta gives a first look at new features like SharePlay, Focus modes, improved iPad multitasking, and more.
